Container.Name: GrafanaMimir
Container.Overview:
Grafana Mimir provides horizontally scalable, highly available, multi-tenant, long-term storage for Prometheus.
NOTE: 1. Download the config.yml file from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/masterwishx/unraid-templates/main/configs/mimir/mimir.yaml before you start the container. Place into your Host Path 2.
More Info: https://github.com/grafana/mimir/blob/main/docs/configurations/demo.yaml https://github.com/grafana/mimir/blob/main/docs/configurations/single-process-config-blocks.yaml
2. Add to Prometheus: #scrapes itself and writes those metrics to Grafana Mimir remote_write: - url: http://10.0.0.119:9009/api/v1/push
3. Add Mimir Datasource in Grafana : http://192.168.0.199:9009/prometheus
